com.foodbook.foodbook
Class Fridge

java.lang.Object
  com.foodbook.foodbook.Fridge

public class Fridge
extends java.lang.Object

Fridge is a collection of User created ingredients.

The User is able to record/edit/view/modify ingredients listed within the "Fridge".

Author:
Jaeseo Park (jaeseo1), Jasmine Woo (jwoo), Nhu Bui (nbui), Robert Janes (rjanes)
